Our verdict
4.92/5

Unibet is a sportsbook with history. Boasting over 20 years of experience in over 100 countries, Unibet has joined the US market only a couple of years ago and already gained huge success. Other than offering a menu that includes sports and leagues from all around the world, Unibet provides its users with unique services. One such service is action betting, a type of in-play betting that lets users bet on the next play, point, or score. And one more treat - Unibet offers its users a live streaming service that is free with conditions applying. These services are available both on the app and website, which are easy to navigate and beautifully built. The customer service is friendly and available 24/7 in most ways convenient to you. If you are intrigued - currently Unibet is offering a sign-up promo in Indiana.
